TopicTitle: Stockalike Gamma & X-ray telescopes? ex. Chandra, Fermi

Articles.Content:
It's funny how Squad adds an infrared telescope by way of the SENTINEL, but neglects the rest of the electromagnetic spectrum. What I'm specifically looking for is a Wolter style telescope for x-rays (like that on Chandra) and a scintillating telescope for gamma rays (like that on Fermi). 

Anyone willing to look for a mod that has them or maybe create them? I'm willing to provide flavor text for part descriptions and science if it hasn't been done yet.
I just found your thread looking for a mod containing the Fermi space telescope. It doesn't look too hard to model so I might give it a try when I have some time.
